name: Facebook -> Facepalm
description: Changes "Facebook" in the top-left corner to "Facepalm."

user.name: johntuley
user.about:
I create some small styles every now and then which tweak only a few things on sites, but eventually I will make a style that applies to an entire site. It's something I've wanted to do for a while, just never got around to it. :P
I have a Donation button although I doubt anyone would ever donate, I haven't made anything worth donating yet. But it's there for the heck of it ...

I might add on to this later. :P

additional_info:
CHANGE LOG:

July 3, 2012 - Rewrote the CSS entirely. It shouldn't become broken anymore, unless Facebook makes major site changes.
May 29, 2012 - Facebook changed some things again, and the logo had to be tweaked a little.
November 28, 2011 - Facepalm didn't look quite right compared to the screenshot. I fixed this, and it looks better. If you already had this script installed, you might need to erase your cache.
October 1, 2011 - Facebook changed some things on the site rendering "Facepalm" completely invisible. This has been fixed.
October 7, 2011 - Facebook changed some things on the site rendering "Facepalm" completely invisible. This has been fixed.
October 7, 2011 - Changed Data URI to a URL.
October 26, 2011 - Facebook changed some things on the site rendering "Facepalm" completely invisible. This has been fixed.
